pullrequest.title: Scenario++: spawn robot at correct location

content.raw:
As xenial ships with ruby 2.3, requiring users to install ruby 2.2 from PPA seems unnecessary.

Works for me ! I did search replace all file url to pull the erbs from that branch instead of default and some minor fixup on the wiki page.
content.html:
As xenial ships with ruby 2.3, requiring users to install ruby 2.2 from PPA seems unnecessary.

Works for me ! I did search replace all file url to pull the erbs from that branch instead of default and some minor fixup on the wiki page.
